summary: This is a forwarded email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York to an FBI agent in New York, attaching subpoenas for pilots related to the Epstein case. The email apologizes for a delay in sending the attachments.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: The sender of the forwarded email who attaches subpoenas for pilots and apologizes for the delay.

persons.name: FBI Agent
persons.context: The recipient of the forwarded email and attachments regarding subpoenas for pilots.

connections.description: The AUSA is forwarding subpoena documents to the FBI agent, indicating coordination on the Epstein investigation.

events.title: Subpoenas for Pilots Forwarded
events.description: An Assistant United States Attorney forwards subpoenas for pilots to an FBI agent via email, apologizing for a delay.

keyFacts: Subpoenas were issued for pilots as part of the Epstein investigation in July 2019.
The communication shows coordination between the U.S. Attorney's Office and the FBI in the Southern District of New York.
The email indicates potential delays or procedural steps in obtaining evidence from pilots.
